About Me

Let me tell you a little bit about myself...

Professional Full Stack Developer with a diverse skill set including over 10 years of client-facing customer service, sales and Leadership experience in Finance, Real Estate and Hospitality seeking a Junior Development or Technical Support role.
Driven and passionate about building modern, well-tested, and responsive web applications in a collaborative environment that bring simple solutions to complicated problems.
My perseverance and tenacity has helped me learn new technologies quickly. I am currently open to new opportunities where I can improve and expand my technical skillset of HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, and C#.
Fluent in English, Bulgarian and conversational Russian.
In my free time I enjoy being a dad, reading, hiking, riding motorcycles and pretending that I can play a guitar.
